dc:title: Strike Leader
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Details the efforts of the farm workers to unionize and the grape boycott. Compares Cesar Chavez to other non-violent leaders and says they are the word made flesh. Digresses about hospitality as following "Him who came not to be served but to serve."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 892 1969-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
